mapper.update:
update tbl_activity_remark
note_content = #{noteContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_flag = #{editFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_activity_remark set note_content = #{noteContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_flag = #{editFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select act.id, act.note_content, act.create_time, user1.name as create_by, act.edit_time, user2.name as edit_by, act.edit_flag from tbl_activity_remark act join tbl_user user1 on act.create_by = user1.id left join tbl_user user2 on act.edit_by = user2.id where act.activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and act.activity_remark_status = 0 order by act.create_time;
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_activity_remark(id, note_content, create_time, create_by, edit_time, edit_by, edit_flag, activity_id, activity_remark_status) values (#{activityRemark.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityRemark.noteContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityRemark.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityRemark.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityRemark.editTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityRemark.editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityRemark.editFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityRemark.activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityRemark.activityRemarkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER});
